reviewText: These sign language DVDs are absolutely beautiful, very well produced, and make learning sign language easy. The performer Hayden Riley is fantastic and truly inspirational. Over time I bought the 4 DVDs separately, and I love them so much  I bought 2 full sets to give as gifts. I highly recommend these DVDs to anyone who wants to learn sign language.  Thank you Tim Riley and Hayden Riley for creating these joyous sign language DVDs. God bless you both.
